programme.title: Golf Academy: McGinley Full Swing
programme.desc: Professional golfers give advice on how to improve your game across all aspects, from the tee to the green. Here, Paul McGinley on the full swing.

programme.title: Golf Academy: Harrington Driver
programme.desc: The Golf Academy offers guidance and all the key tips and tricks on how to make your golfing game even stronger. Here, a special episode on using the driver with Padraig Harrington.

programme.title: Golf Academy:Harrington Short Game
programme.desc: The Golf Academy offers guidance and all the key tips and tricks on how to make your golfing game even stronger. Here, Padraig Harrington on how to improve your short game.

programme.title: PGA Championship Official Film2018
programme.desc: The official film of the 2018 PGA Championship from the Bellerive Golf Course in Missouri. American Justin Thomas came into the tournament as defending champion.

programme.title: PGA Championship Official Film2019
programme.desc: The official film of the 2019 PGA Championship from the Bethpage Black Course in New York. Brooks Koepka came into the event looking to defend his title from 2018.

programme.title: PGA Championship Official Film2023
programme.desc: The official film of the 2023 PGA Championship, as Oak Hill Country Club took centre stage once more for the 105th playing of this storied Major ultimately won by Brooks Koepka.

programme.title: PGA Championship Official Film2010
programme.desc: The official film of the 2010 PGA Championship from Whistling Straits in Haven, Wisconsin, where Martin Kaymer of Germany won the first of his two Major championship triumphs.

programme.title: PGA Championship Official Film2012
programme.desc: The official film of the 2012 PGA Championship from Kiawah Island Golf Resort in South Carolina. Keegan Bradley entered this tournament as defending champion.

programme.title: PGA Championship Official Film2014
programme.desc: The official film of the 2014 PGA Championship from Valhalla Golf Club in Kentucky. Jason Dufner entered this tournament as defending champion.

programme.title: PGA Tour Golf Highlights
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the PGA Tour's Truist Championship, taking place at the Philadelphia Cricket Club. 2025 Masters champion Rory McIlroy claimed victory last season.

programme.title: Asian Tour Golf Highlights
programme.desc: Action from the Asian Tour, the official sanctioning body for professional golf in the region, as Caledonian Golf Club staged the International Series Japan.

programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the HotelPlanner Tour's visit to Spain for the Challenge de España at Fontanals Golf Club in Girona.

programme.desc: Join Paul McGinley and Brandel Chamblee as they preview the action ahead of the 107th edition of the PGA Championship, held at Quail Hollow Club in Charlotte, North Carolina.

programme.title: ATP Tour This Week
programme.desc: Step behind the scenes of men's professional tennis throughout the 2025 season on the ATP Tour with special features, interviews and much more.

programme.title: Bitesize Tennis Classics
programme.desc: Bitesize highlights of men's British number one Jack Draper's first ATP 500 final, as the US Open semi-finalist fought Karen Khachanov for the Erste Bank Open trophy in Vienna. (27.10)

programme.title: Bitesize Tennis Classics
programme.desc: Jack Draper goes for his first ATP Tour title as the Brit competes in the Stuttgart final against a former Wimbledon finalist and two-time champion here, Matteo Berrettini. (16.06)

programme.title: Bitesize Tennis Classics
programme.desc: In a rematch of the 2023 Madrid Open final, world number one Iga Swiatek and defending champion Aryna Sabalenka meet again to determine this year's women's singles champion. (04.05)

programme.title: Bitesize Tennis Classics
programme.desc: Frances Tiafoe joins Laura Robson on the Sky Sports Tennis podcast to answer 10 questions about his life and career, including a debate on love v success and his dream dinner party guests.

programme.title: Serena v Hingis 1999
programme.desc: Twenty-two years before Emma Raducanu's triumph over Leylah Fernandez, Serena Williams and Martina Hingis locked horns in an all-teenage final at the 1999 US Open in the women's singles.

programme.title: WTA Final: Doha
programme.desc: Jelena Ostapenko's near seven-year wait to vie for a WTA 1000 title ends in Doha, as the former Grand Slam champion faces 23-year-old American Amanda Anisimova in an unseeded final. (15.02)

programme.title: ATP 2025 Season Final Hlts
programme.desc: In Doha, Great Britain's Jack Draper - entering his fifth ATP final - comes up against fifth seed and 2020 tournament champion Andrey Rublev in the final of the 2025 Qatar Open. (22.02)

programme.title: Rome Tennis Highlights
programme.desc: Revisit a match from yesterday's action at the Internazionali BNL d'Italia in Rome. Here, Jack Draper met Carlos Alcaraz in the quarter-finals.

programme.desc: Revisit a match from yesterday's action at the Internazionali BNL d'Italia in Rome. Here, Coco Gauff met Mirra Andreeva in the quarter-finals.

programme.title: Live Tennis: ATP Rome QFs
programme.desc: In a repeat of last year's Italian Open quarter-finals, the American Tommy Paul, who beat Alex De Minaur last round, goes up against Poland's Hubert Hurkacz in Rome.

programme.title: Live Tennis: WTA Rome Semi-Finals
programme.desc: Jasmine Paolini's quest for glory on home turf continues, playing a semi-final clash with Peyton Stearns in Rome. Brits Joe Salisbury and Neal Skupski also feature in men's doubles action.

programme.title: Live Tennis: ATP Rome QFs
programme.desc: World number one Jannik Sinner faces 2025 Madrid Open winner Casper Ruud in the quarter-finals at the Italian Open. The Italian is now undefeated in his last 24 matches.

programme.title: Live Tennis: WTA Rome Semi-Finals
programme.desc: At the Italian Open, Madrid Open finalist Coco Gauff and Qinwen Zheng, who defeated world number one Aryna Sabalenka last round, battle it out in the semi-finals.

programme.title: ATP 2025 Season Final Hlts
programme.desc: Britain's Jack Draper steps on court for the Madrid Open final aiming to lift his second Masters 1000 crown, as the 23-year-old faces 14th seed Casper Ruud for the first time. (04.05)

programme.title: WTA Final: Madrid
programme.desc: In a repeat of the 2023 US Open final, two-time Madrid champion Aryna Sabalenka eyes another marquee title against Coco Gauff, who won their only prior clay-court meeting. (03.05)

programme.title: ATP 2025 Season Final Hlts
programme.desc: Top seed Tallon Griekspoor competes in his maiden tour-level championship match on clay, as the Dutchman faces 23-year-old Italian Luciano Darderi in the final of ATP Marrakesh. (06.04)

programme.desc: In the Halle final, world number one Jannik Sinner comes up against 2022 winner Hubert Hurkacz. (23.06)
